body:
The new dispatcher runs at invocation time, not at op instantiation time. `TryCreateOperator()` just returns you a wrapper that will call the dispatcher whenever you invoke the op.

This is also the reason why this is a separate registry. In caffe2, there's different registries for different devices, but I want to ignore the device and always return this wrapper.

This is also the reason why this is a separate registry. In caffe2, there's different registries for different devices, but I want to ignore the device and always return this wrapper.
